subtopics.title: Variables and Data Types
subtopics.description: Understanding how variables store data and the different data types in Java.

subtopics.title: Operators
subtopics.description: Exploring various operators like arithmetic, relational, and logical operators in Java.

subtopics.title: Control Flow
subtopics.description: Learning about decision-making constructs such as if-else, switch, and loops in Java.

subtopics.title: Methods
subtopics.description: Defining and using methods to encapsulate reusable code in Java.

subtopics.title: Classes and Objects
subtopics.description: Introducing the concept of classes and objects in object-oriented programming.

subtopics.title: Arrays
subtopics.description: Understanding the creation, manipulation, and traversal of arrays in Java.

subtopics.title: ArrayList
subtopics.description: Exploring the dynamic array implementation in Java Collections.

subtopics.title: LinkedList
subtopics.description: Understanding the linked list data structure and its implementation in Java.

subtopics.title: HashMap
subtopics.description: Explaining the key-value mapping and hash table implementation in Java.

subtopics.title: Set Interface
subtopics.description: Introducing the set interface and its implementations like HashSet and TreeSet.

subtopics.title: Inheritance
subtopics.description: Understanding how classes can inherit attributes and methods from other classes in Java.

subtopics.title: Polymorphism
subtopics.description: Exploring the ability of objects to take on multiple forms in Java.

subtopics.title: Abstraction
subtopics.description: Discussing the concept of abstraction to hide complex implementation details.

subtopics.title: Encapsulation
subtopics.description: Explaining data hiding and encapsulation of data within objects.

subtopics.title: Interfaces
subtopics.description: Defining interfaces and implementing multiple inheritance using interfaces in Java.

subtopics.title: Try-Catch Blocks
subtopics.description: Learning how to handle exceptions using try-catch blocks in Java.

subtopics.title: Throw and Throws
subtopics.description: Understanding the throw and throws keywords for custom exceptions and method signatures.

subtopics.title: Finally Block
subtopics.description: Exploring the finally block for code that must execute regardless of exceptions.

subtopics.title: Exception Types
subtopics.description: Identifying different types of exceptions and their handling in Java.

subtopics.title: Custom Exceptions
subtopics.description: Creating custom exception classes for specific error scenarios.

subtopics.title: File Input and Output
subtopics.description: Reading from and writing to files using file input and output streams.

subtopics.title: Buffered Reader and Writer
subtopics.description: Using buffered reader and writer for efficient file reading and writing.

subtopics.title: Serialization
subtopics.description: Understanding object serialization for persisting object state in files.

subtopics.title: File Handling Best Practices
subtopics.description: Discussing best practices for file handling to ensure data integrity and security.

subtopics.title: Working with Directories
subtopics.description: Manipulating directories, listing files, and managing file systems in Java.

subtopics.title: Threads
subtopics.description: Introduction to threads for concurrent execution of tasks in Java.

subtopics.title: Synchronization
subtopics.description: Synchronizing threads to prevent race conditions and ensure data consistency.

subtopics.title: Locks and Conditions
subtopics.description: Using explicit locks and conditions for advanced thread synchronization.

subtopics.title: Executor Framework
subtopics.description: Utilizing executor framework for managing thread execution in Java.

subtopics.title: Atomic Variables
subtopics.description: Exploring atomic variables for thread-safe operations without explicit synchronization.

subtopics.title: Swing Components
subtopics.description: Creating GUI applications using Swing components like buttons, labels, and text fields.

subtopics.title: Event Handling
subtopics.description: Handling user interactions and events in GUI applications.

subtopics.title: Layout Managers
subtopics.description: Understanding layout managers to organize GUI components on screens.

subtopics.title: Dialog Boxes
subtopics.description: Working with dialog boxes for user input, messages, and alerts.

subtopics.title: Custom GUI Design
subtopics.description: Designing custom GUIs with customized components and layouts.
